FuncDef:
The remote-ip auto-dod-request block command disables the automatic triggering of a request to a downstream node for a label mapping message associated with a remote LDP peer of a specified LSR ID in DoD mode.
The undo remote-ip auto-dod-request block command restores the default setting.
By default, the function is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To disable the automatic triggering of a request to a downstream node for a label mapping message associated with a specified LSR ID in DoD mode, run the remote-ip auto-dod-request block command.
